original_text: Whenever the people saw the pillar of cloud standing at the entrance to the tent, they all stood and worshiped, each at the entrance to their tent.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 회막 문에 구름 기둥이 서 있는 것을 보고 다 일어나 각기 장막 문에 서서 예배하며

sentences.original_text: Whenever the people saw the pillar of cloud
standing at the entrance to the tent
each at the entrance to their tent
